segments.text: Hi , I'm George . I'll be your waiter this evening . Are you ready to order or do you need a few more minutes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm ready now . I'd like the roast chicken and a side order of corn .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And would you like an appetizer before your meal ? The soup of the day is our delicious tomato soup .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll pass on the soup , but I'd like a garden salad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I get you anything to drink ? :
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like a glass of iced tea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . I'll be back in a minute with your drink and salad .
segments.speaker: S1
